author: PFCal-dev
body:
This PR includes important changes of the architecture of the HGCAL TPG code

An overview of this new software architecture had been presented [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/624663/contributions/2525557/). It provides a more flexible data flow and also reflects better the current electronics architecture design.
This new infrastructure will facilitate the development of frontend and backend algorithms and also give the possibility to easily run in parallel several trigger workflows.
title: [HGCAL trigger] Update of the general code architecture
